title: Fazlur Rehman condemns bomb blast on JUI-F convention in Bajaur
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 30 (APP): Chief of Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam (JUI-F) Maulana Fazlur Rehman on Sunday strongly condemned a bomb blast at a convention of JUI-F in Bajaur and expressed grief and sorrow over the tragic incident.
In a statement issued by the partyâ€™s media cell, he prayed the Allah Almighty to raise the ranks of martyrs and for speedy recovery of the injured.
Maulana Fazlur Rehman also appealed to JUI-F workers to immediately rush to hospitals and provide blood donations to the victims.
He sought an inquiry into the explosion from Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif and the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa government.
